direction: Directions to SolveEach of the following questions consists of two sets of figures. Figures A, B, C and D constitute the Problem Set while figures 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 constitute the Answer Set. There is a definite relationship between figures A and B. Establish a similar relationship between figures C and D by selecting a suitable figure from the Answer Set that would replace the question mark (?) in fig. (D).
question: Select a suitable figure from the Answer Figures that would replace the question mark (?).Problem Figures:                            Answer Figures:(A)     (B)      (C)     (D)                  (1)      (2)      (3)      (4)      (5)
answer_description: The half-shaded leaf rotates 135oACW and the unshaded leaf rotates 135oCW.

answer_description: The upper element is converted to an element similar to the lower elements and each one of the lower elements is converted to an element similar to the upper element.
